headline: Tell HN: Brave Browser is still messing with affiliate links
description:
Previously they had been autofilling links and replacing affiliate links with their code:

https://www.theverge.com/2020/6/8/21283769/brave-browser-affiliate-links-crypto-privacy-ceo-apology

They stopped doing that but I found they appear to remove affiliate links altogether unless it comes from them.

Just to test I put NordVPN's affiliate link structure and viola it gets removed:

<a href="https://go.nordvpn.net/aff_c">Test Affiliate Link</a>
headline_zh-Hans: 告诉HN：Brave浏览器仍在扰乱联盟链接
headline_zh-Hant: 告訴HN：Brave瀏覽器仍在擾亂聯盟鏈接
description_zh-Hans:
之前他们一直在自动填充链接，并用他们的代码替换联盟链接：

https://www.theverge.com/2020/6/8/21283769/brave-browser-affiliate-links-crypto-privacy-ceo-apology

他们停止了这样做，但我发现他们似乎完全删除了联盟链接，除非它来自他们。

只是为了测试我把NordVPN的联盟链接结构和viola它被删除：

<a href="https://go.nordvpn.net/aff_c">测试联盟链接</a>
description_zh-Hant:
之前他們一直在自動填充鏈接，並用他們的代碼替換聯盟鏈接：

https://www.theverge.com/2020/6/8/21283769/brave-browser-affiliate-links-crypto-privacy-ceo-apology

他們停止了這樣做，但我發現他們似乎完全刪除了聯盟鏈接，除非它來自他們。

只是為了測試我把NordVPN的聯盟鏈接結構和viola它被刪除：

<a href="https://go.nordvpn.net/aff_c">測試聯盟鏈接</a>
